#

Company Name

Case Study

Based in Wilmington, Delaware, First Choice Cleaning Services supports a community of skilled artisans in Pemaquid, Maine, representing more than 80 Main-based bussinesses online and in their beautiful 150-year old barn.

It was a pleasure contributing to their website redesign. We redesigned their Shopify website, customizing a theme with emphasis on the purchasing experience and product display.

  • Strategy, Design and Development
  • Custom WordPress responsive theme
  • Marketing--see Resume
  • Improve Performance
  • Focus on Acccessibility
  • WordPress, PHP, MySQL

The Good Supply's store in Pemaquid, Maine.

Design Highlights (option two)

The focus of the redesign was to improve the branding and give the entire site a more cohesive look and feel, from browsing through products to the purchase experience. We selected a quality theme that came with built in responsive features and improved functionality. Most of the redesign efforts went into customizing the theme to fit our needs.

Artisan Pages

One goal for the new site was to highlight the Artisans. We created a page showing all the artisans, organized by the material they worked with.

We aslo created a page for a single artisan that might images of the artisan, their workspace and avalible products.

Content Strategy

CAPR has many members and local chapters in different states. A major challenge was creating a system that allowed all members to contribute to the site, an important way to engage volunteer, while limiting powerful editor access.

CAPR is primarily made up of volunteer and is involved in court cases, political action and advocacy for land use disputes across the country. Keeping the site up to date would require many non-technical volunteer being able to easily contribute to the site. We also needed a

Technical Details

We built their new website using Drupal easily create the various account types with targeted permissions. In order to engage as many members, the barrior to contributing content had to be low. On the other hand, featured content needed to be curated before making it's way to the main pages.

We created a page template with the artisan and their products. Shopify uses, a template language. Citizens' Alliance for Property Rights was organized in 2003 as a non-partisan political action committee where individual citizens and existing organizations can work together protecting property rights.

Permissions

We built their new website using Drupal easily create the various account types with targeted permissions. In order to engage as many members, the barrior to contributing content had to be low. On the other hand, featured content needed to be curated before making it's way to the main pages...Create a system that make sit easy to contribute content while limiting posting featured content to priveleged users.
